name: KardVenture
storyline: KardVenture is a fantasy survival card game where you assume the role of a renowned hero, braving a myriad of perils while exploring the realm of Vayandor. Establish and fortify your village to thwart an array of adversaries, spanning from feral goblins to formidable orcs and the mysterious undead.
summary: KardVenture is a survival card game where you play as a legendary hero. Explore mysterious locations, gather resources, build your village and face the challenges ahead, be it a cold blizzard or an orc raid. Stack cards to make combos, craft, build, fight and most important... Survive!
